# DocCov SaaS Platform UI/UX Specification

**Priority:** P2
**Phase:** Web Platform
**Labels:** `enhancement`, `ui`, `ux`, `major-feature`

## Design Philosophy

Inspired by OpenCode's desktop interface - a refined, developer-focused aesthetic that feels like a native macOS app. Clean typography, generous whitespace, muted earth-tone accents, and information-dense panels that don't feel cluttered.

### Core Principles

1. **Developer-native** - Feels like a tool built by developers, for developers
2. **Information density without clutter** - Show a lot, but organize it well
3. **Two-panel layouts** - Context on left, details on right
4. **Muted, warm palette** - Sage greens, warm creams, soft shadows
5. **Mono-first typography** - Code is the star, UI text supports it

---

## Design System

### Color Palette

```css
:root {
  /* Backgrounds */
  --bg-primary: #fafaf8;        /* Warm off-white */
  --bg-secondary: #f5f5f3;      /* Subtle cream */
  --bg-tertiary: #eeeee9;       /* Card backgrounds */
  --bg-dark: #1a1a1a;           /* Dark mode primary */
  --bg-dark-secondary: #242424; /* Dark mode cards */

  /* Accent - Sage Green (from OpenCode) */
  --accent: #7c9a7c;            /* Primary sage */
  --accent-light: #a3bfa3;      /* Hover state */
  --accent-muted: #e8efe8;      /* Subtle backgrounds */
  --accent-dark: #5a7a5a;       /* Active state */

  /* Text */
  --text-primary: #1a1a1a;
  --text-secondary: #6b6b6b;
  --text-tertiary: #9a9a9a;
  --text-inverse: #fafafa;

  /* Coverage spectrum */
  --coverage-excellent: #4ade80;  /* 80%+ */
  --coverage-good: #facc15;       /* 50-79% */
  --coverage-poor: #f87171;       /* <50% */

  /* Diff colors */
  --diff-add: #22c55e;
  --diff-remove: #ef4444;
  --diff-add-bg: #dcfce7;
  --diff-remove-bg: #fee2e2;

  /* Kind badges */
  --kind-function: #8b5cf6;
  --kind-class: #3b82f6;
  --kind-interface: #06b6d4;
  --kind-type: #14b8a6;
  --kind-enum: #f59e0b;
  --kind-variable: #64748b;

  /* Borders */
  --border-subtle: #e5e5e0;
  --border-medium: #d4d4cf;
}
```

### Typography

```css
:root {
  /* Font families */
  --font-sans: 'IBM Plex Sans', -apple-system, sans-serif;
  --font-mono: 'IBM Plex Mono', 'SF Mono', monospace;

  /* Scale */
  --text-xs: 0.75rem;    /* 12px - timestamps, badges */
  --text-sm: 0.875rem;   /* 14px - secondary text */
  --text-base: 1rem;     /* 16px - body */
  --text-lg: 1.125rem;   /* 18px - section headers */
  --text-xl: 1.25rem;    /* 20px - page titles */
  --text-2xl: 1.5rem;    /* 24px - hero text */
}
```

### Spacing & Layout

```css
:root {
  /* Spacing scale */
  --space-1: 0.25rem;   /* 4px */
  --space-2: 0.5rem;    /* 8px */
  --space-3: 0.75rem;   /* 12px */
  --space-4: 1rem;      /* 16px */
  --space-5: 1.25rem;   /* 20px */
  --space-6: 1.5rem;    /* 24px */
  --space-8: 2rem;      /* 32px */
  --space-10: 2.5rem;   /* 40px */
  --space-12: 3rem;     /* 48px */

  /* Layout */
  --sidebar-width: 280px;
  --panel-min-width: 400px;
  --max-content-width: 1400px;

  /* Radius */
  --radius-sm: 4px;
  --radius-md: 6px;
  --radius-lg: 8px;
  --radius-xl: 12px;
}
```

### Shadows

```css
:root {
  --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
  --shadow-md: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
  --shadow-lg: 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
  --shadow-panel: 0 0 0 1px var(--border-subtle), 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
}
```

---

## Component Library

### 1. Coverage Meter

Circular progress indicator with percentage.

```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚    â•­â”€â”€â”€â•®    â”‚
â”‚   â•± 87% â•²   â”‚
â”‚  â”‚       â”‚  â”‚
â”‚   â•²     â•±   â”‚
â”‚    â•°â”€â”€â”€â•¯    â”‚
â”‚  Excellent  â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

**States**: Excellent (green, 80%+), Good (yellow, 50-79%), Poor (red, <50%)

### 2. Kind Badge

Small pill showing export type with icon.

```
[fn] createClient    [cls] QueryClient    [type] Options
```

**Colors**: Function (purple), Class (blue), Interface (cyan), Type (teal), Enum (amber)

### 3. File Reference Chip

Inline clickable file reference (like OpenCode's @file.tsx style).

```
In @client.ts and @utils.ts add a variation of @types.ts
```

**Styling**: Monospace, sage green background, rounded pill

---

## Feature Parity Matrix

### SDK â†’ UI Mapping

| SDK Function | UI Surface |
|--------------|------------|
| `analyze()` | Scan page, Repository overview |
| `extractPackageSpec()` | Spec viewer (JSON tab), Download button |
| `runExamples()` | Examples page, Run buttons |
| `runExamplesWithPackage()` | Playground with package selector |
| `detectExampleRuntimeErrors()` | Example status badges (âœ“/âœ—) |
| `detectExampleAssertionFailures()` | Assertion diff in output panel |
| `parseAssertions()` | Inline assertion highlighting |
| `generateFix()` | Fix suggestions in drift cards |
| `categorizeDrifts()` | Drift page grouping |
| `isFixableDrift()` | "Auto-fixable" badge |

### API â†’ UI Mapping

| API Endpoint | UI Surface |
|--------------|------------|
| `GET /badge/:owner/:repo` | Badge preview, copy embed code |
| `GET /widget/:owner/:repo` | Widget preview, copy embed code |
| `GET /leaderboard` | Leaderboard page |
| `GET /scan-stream` | Scan progress modal (SSE) |
| `GET /spec/:owner/:repo` | Raw JSON tab, download |
| `POST /examples/run` | Playground execute, example run buttons |

### Spec Data â†’ UI Mapping

| Spec Field | UI Representation |
|------------|-------------------|
| `meta.name` | Header, breadcrumbs |
| `meta.version` | Version badge |
| `exports[]` | Export list, search, filters |
| `exports[].kind` | Kind badge (fn, cls, type...) |
| `exports[].description` | Description text, preview |
| `exports[].signatures` | Signature code block |
| `exports[].examples` | Example cards with run buttons |
| `exports[].docs.coverageScore` | Coverage meter (circle + bar) |
| `exports[].docs.missing` | Signal breakdown bars |
| `exports[].docs.drift` | Drift cards, badges |
| `types[]` | Types tab, type reference links |

---

## Interaction Patterns

### 1. Keyboard Navigation

- `âŒ˜K` / `Ctrl+K` - Global search
- `âŒ˜/` / `Ctrl+/` - Toggle sidebar
- `â†‘â†“` - Navigate lists
- `Enter` - Select item
- `Esc` - Close modals/panels

### 2. Context Menus

Right-click on exports, files, drift items for quick actions:
- View in GitHub
- Copy link
- Copy fix
- Run example

### 3. Drag and Drop

- Reorder pinned repositories
- Drag exports to compare

### 4. Real-time Updates

- SSE for scan progress
- WebSocket for playground output
- Polling for coverage history

---

## Mobile Considerations

- Sidebar collapses to hamburger menu
- Two-panel becomes stacked (detail slides in from right)
- Code blocks horizontally scrollable
- Touch-friendly tap targets (48px minimum)
- Swipe gestures for navigation

---

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Design system tokens implemented in CSS variables
- [ ] All core components built (see Component Library)
- [ ] All pages implemented with responsive layouts
- [ ] 1:1 parity with SDK functions
- [ ] 1:1 parity with API endpoints
- [ ] All spec data fields displayed
- [ ] Light and dark themes
- [ ] Keyboard navigation
- [ ] Mobile-responsive
- [ ] Loading and error states for all async operations
